welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Rescaldina, where history, culture, and charm come together to create a truly unique experience. Known for our beautiful architecture and delicious cuisine, we invite you to explore our city and immerse yourself in the Italian way of life. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves low-cost and charter flights.

terminals.name: Terminal Cargo
terminals.description: This terminal handles cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for the first 60 minutes.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linate Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Linate Airport, mainly used for charter and low-cost flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Connect to the network and follow the instructions to access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lugano Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
